bibl.title: From al-Andalus to Khurasan. Documents from the Medieval Muslim World

series.title: Islamic History and Civilization. Studies and Texts

bibl.note: 13 papers delivered at a colloquium held in March 2004 in Granada on the theme ""Documentary Evidence and the History of Early Islamic Mediterranean"". - Pp. xvii-xviii: Eduardo Manzano Moreno, Introduction; - 243-252: Index.
bibl.seg: Petra M. Sijpesteijn, Lennart Sundelin, Sofía Torallas Tovar & Amalia Zomeño (edd.), From al-Andalus to Khurasan. Documents from the Medieval Muslim World = Islamic History and Civilization. Studies and Texts. 66.
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 2007, 8°, xxviii-252 pp., 4 figg., 18 pll. ISBN 978-90-04-15567-1. €102.

13 papers delivered at a colloquium held in March 2004 in Granada on the theme ""Documentary Evidence and the History of Early Islamic Mediterranean"". - Pp. xvii-xviii: Eduardo Manzano Moreno, Introduction; - 243-252: Index.
C.R. par Raquel Martín Hernández, CCO 4 (2007) pp. 473-474.
Sijpesteijn Sundelin Torallas Tovar Zomeño Manzano Moreno
